definition: To lower one's upper body as a gesture of respect or courtesy, typically performed by bending at the waist. This action is commonly seen in formal settings, such as when greeting someone of higher social status or showing reverence during a performance or ceremony.

examples.german: Er verneigt sich vor der Königin.
Wir verneigen uns als Zeichen des Respekts.
examples.english: We bow as a sign of respect.

examples.german: Die Schauspieler verneigten sich nach der Vorstellung.
examples.english: The actors bowed after the performance.
